A dip in my life!

About

I’m an undergradute Computer Engineering student at Aligarh Muslim University. I have Co-Founded the AUV ZHCET club, and I’m learning about Self driving cars. Reading politcal books and taking landscape photographs.

Career

  • February 2020

    Publication: Effective thermal conductivity of unsaturated sand using artificial neural network (ANN) and lattice element method (LEM)

  • December 2019

    Publication: Estimation of seismic wave velocities of metamorphic rocks using artificial neural network

  • August 2019

    Chairperson of Marine Technological Society, Aligarh Chapter

  • August 2019

    Project: Underwater simulations of Autonomous Underwater Vehicle AUVs

  • June 2019 - August 2019

    Research intern at the University of Kiel, Germany

  • January 2019

    Project: Acoustic Localization of beacons in AUVs.

  • August 2018 - December 2018

    Minor Project: Camera tuning AI using Deep Reinforecement leraning

  • June 2018 - July 2018

    Student Intern at Saudi White Cement. Learnt Network Security and ERP tools of Oracle & SAP.

  • March 2018

    Represented college team in Singapore AUV Challenge - 2018 at Singapore Polytechnic. Won “Best AUV” Challenge.

  • January 2018

    Top 4 presenter in Aspiring Entrepreneurs Summit - 2018 in Riyadh.

  • August 2017

    Co-Founded AUV ZHCET Club at college.

  • August 2016

    Started Bachelors in Computer Engineering from AMU

  • April 2012 - March 2016

    Completed my schooling from Int’l Indian School Jeddah
